ComicInfo.Penciller: Frank Quitely,Shannon Wheeler,Rick Geary,Shannon Wheeler,Frank Quitely,Rick Geary
ComicInfo.Summary:
Shannon Wheeler's "Too Much Coffee Man" makes its Dark Horse Presents debut this issue as his send-up of Dante's Inferno explores the levels of coffee hell: the rush, the jitters, and the crash.
"Blackheart" by Robbie Morrison and Frank Quitely continues. Seneca must confront the evil of Kane, who unleashes his poisonous scheme to destroy all people who do not fit his fascist views of the world.
Rick Geary gives us "Night Drive," a lyrical prose work examining the mysteries of the evening on a fantasy ride to the outer limits.
ComicInfo.Title: Too Much Coffee Man Meets His Maker (Part 1); Blackheart (Part 2); Night-Drive
ComicInfo.Writer: Rick Geary,Robbie Morrison,Shannon Wheeler,Shannon Wheeler,Robbie Morrison,Rick Geary
